name: Spiral (Koala | Nick)
description:
Second project I've made for CDM 175, this time a text-based game.  

Here introduce to whomever sees this: Spiral, a sort choose-your-own adventure kind of game without the actual adventure.  Just a little thing that I hope I'm representing right, considering it's somewhat personal.

Controls:

A mix of having to use the 'Spacebar' and 'Arrow Keys' when playing, there are written and images of what Arrow Keys to press within each scene.  You can also press 'R' to restart the game back to the title menu and 'Q' to exit out of the game entirely.
